1.title: Larry King: The Voice of a Generation

episode of.title: In Case You Didn't Know with Nick Nanton (TV Series 2018â€“ )

1.plot: Legendary television personality Larry King talks with Nick Nanton about his start in radio, key moments in his career and why leaving CNN wasn't the end of his on-camera career. See Larry King as you've never seen him before in this entertaining and thought-provoking conversation as he talks personal life, 9/11 and when the OJ Simpson trial.

imdb.plot outline: Join 11-time Emmy Award winning director, Nick Nanton, who has been called, "the voice of a new generation" by legendary personality Larry King, as he interviews some some people you know and some people you should, in this intimate docuseries.
imdb.title: In Case You Didn't Know with Nick Nanton
